name: Team Dream Meme Queens​ - Polish Cow Clicker
name_original: Team Dream Meme Queens​ - Polish Cow Clicker
description:
Team Name - Team Dream Meme Queens

Description

This game is based on the polish cow meme.  The menu includes animations as well as the option to play, change the volume or leave the game. When pressing the game ,left click the cow to increase your score. Overtime you will change the skin of the cow based on how many times you click. This goes up to 2000.

How to play:

Press left mouse button to click

In options there is a music slider
